snippet: The former representative faces a major challenge in overcoming last year’s scandal over his lewd online behavior.
abstract: Former Rep Anthony D Weiner of New York is said to be considering a return to politics, one year after a scandal over his lewd online behavior forced him to resign his House seat; Weiner has roughly $4.5 million for a political candidacy and a deadline to use it next year or miss out on $1.5 million in public matching funds.
lead_paragraph: The former representative faces a major challenge in overcoming last year’s scandal over his lewd online behavior.

headline.seo: Anthony Weiner Longs for Second Chance in Politics, Friends Say
headline.main: Anthony Weiner Longs for a Second Chance in Politics, Friends Say
headline.print_headline: Year After Scandal, Weiner Longs for a Second Chance in Politics, His Friends Say
